sections.installation:
Installation and Usage Process for iVALT

1. Download the iVALT App

For Android Users: Download from the Google Play Store at Google Play Store – iVALT.
For iOS Users: Download from the Apple App Store at Apple App Store – iVALT.

2. Activate the iVALT App
Open the App: After downloading, open the iVALT app on your mobile phone.
Register: Follow the prompts to enter your details and register within the app.

3. Install the iVALT WordPress Plugin
Download Link: Use this link to download the iVALT WordPress plugin: WordPress.org – iVALT Plugin.
Installation: Once downloaded, install and activate the plugin on your WordPress site.

4. Link the iVALT App with WordPress

**Access the Plugin:** After activation, the iVALT plugin will appear on the WordPress site left sidebar. Click on it to open the registration form.

**Register Mobile Number:** Enter the mobile number you registered with the iVALT app into the WordPress plugin form.

**Biometric Verification:** You will receive a notification alert on the iVALT mobile app for biometric verification via FaceID. Complete this step to sync your mobile with the WordPress plugin.

5. Secure Your Site

**Biometric Authentication:** Each time you attempt to log in to the site, you will need to verify your identity using biometric authentication through the iVALT mobile app.

**Enhanced Security:** Your site is now fully secured with iVALT, providing much higher security than was previously available for your WordPress website.
sections.faq:
Q. What does iVALT provide?

Ans: iVALT provides the strongest alternative to 2FA for WordPress, which includes 1-click verification of FaceID and device ID. Users can opt-in for geofencing and time windowing as a paid option.

Q. Why do I need iVALT?

Ans: Theft of login and passwords for WordPress enable anyone access to your website without needing to verify biometrics or device. Using iVALT ensures that only registered iVALT users authorized to use your WordPress website can gain access.

Q. What do I need to do to use iVALT?

Ans: iVALT requires the download and installation of a mobile app AND the WordPress plugin. The mobile app is used to verify FaceID from your mobile phone when prompted by the iVALT WordPress plugin during the login process.

Q. Is the technology approved by WordPress?

Ans: Yes, iVALT has been approved for use by both WordPress.org (for the plugin) and Google Play and the Apple Store (for mobile apps).

Q. What does the mobile app do?

Ans: The iVALT mobile app registers your mobile number to iVALT and enables facial recognition and device verification when requested by your WordPress website. When you are logging in and have successfully entered your login and password, your website will request Biometric Authentication from your mobile phone. Once authenticated by the mobile app, your website will login automatically.

Q. Can I use iVALT for other applications besides WordPress?

Ans: iVALT is working with a variety of application providers to enable facial recognition from mobile phones. Using iVALT provides the highest level of protection to ensure that the person with login and password information is actually the person authorized to use this information. Applications include online access, document verification, online content verification, IOT device access and physical access (locks).

Q. What if I want to stop using iVALT?

Ans: You can go to the iVALT tab on the left side of the admin dashboard and click to disable the iVALT app. You will be asked to authenticate with your biometrics on your mobile phone to disable iVALT authentication.

Tags: cybersecurity, 3 rd factor, user authentication, user log-in, password, online access, identity protection, Security.
Requires at least: 5.1
Tested up to: 6.3
Stable tag: 5.1

iVALT’s plugin protects WordPress websites more securely than 2FA solutions and only requires1-click instead of typing 6 digits for every website login. The use of biometric authentication ensures that unauthorized users are unable to access your site, even if they possess the correct login credentials. iVALT also provides device ID verification, and can provide the option for geofencing and time windowing to block unauthorized users from devices and locations that you do not approve. To utilize iVALT, users must first download and install the iVALT mobile app and then the WordPress Plugin. Once set up, the iVALT solution is straightforward to use, as it is automatically added to the normal WordPress login process. All WP user roles can be provisioned to use iVALT, including subscribers.

iVALT User Registration

To start with, download and install the iVALT mobile app to your mobile phone. This process only requires FaceID, your name, mobile number (to validate) and a valid email address (that will be verified). Once this is done, you can download the WordPress plugin to your website and activate it. The next time you login to WordPress, go to the iVALT tab that is now available on the left navigation and enter your mobile number. You will be asked to verify your biometrics on your mobile phone and you are ready to use iVALT authentication for WordPress.

Privacy Policy

https://ivalt.com/privacypolicy-eula.html
Date of Privacy Policy: March 1, 2023
